Uses of BindRequest in org.opends.sdk
 

Subinterfaces of BindRequest in org.opends.sdk
 interface GenericBindRequest
          A generic Bind request which should be used for unsupported authentication methods.
 interface SimpleBindRequest
          The simple authentication method of the Bind Operation provides three authentication mechanisms: An anonymous authentication mechanism, in which both the name (the bind DN) and password are zero length.
 

Methods in org.opends.sdk that return BindRequest
 BindRequest BindRequest.addControl(Control control)
          Adds the provided control to this request.
 BindRequest BindRequest.clearControls()
          Removes all the controls included with this request.
 BindRequest BindRequest.setName(String dn)
          Sets the distinguished name of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as.
 

Methods in org.opends.sdk with parameters of type BindRequest
 BindResultFuture Connection.bind(BindRequest request, ResultHandler<BindResult> handler)
          Authenticates to the Directory Server using the provided bind request.
